channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Theologian - Neutral Offencive
channel.description:
The Theologian - Neutral Offensive Passive: Faithful - Appear BD to invest abillitys. You are occupy immune.
Day ability: Reserve - All day ability's on your target will fail today(3 uses)
Night ability 1: Preach - Occupy your target and all of his visitors (Unlimited) Night ability 2: Blessing - Give a player Occupy and Night immunity this night. Does not inform them of this unless they were Occupied or Attacked(2 Uses)
Goal: Ensure the Blue Dragon falls and either you survive or that another Neutral wins.
Ex1: You survive but the other neutrals die with the BD - You win Ex2: You die but the Scorned executed thier target and the BD fell - You win Ex3: You die but the Fool is executed with the Unseen - You lose ect...
Blessing goes before the drunk's happy hour meaning that he will remove the Immunity's you add.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Theologian - Neutral Offencive
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
I’m assuming it was just poorly worded, and it’s “The Fool gets executed, but also the Unseen get executed” (presumably with BD winning)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Theologian - Neutral Offencive
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Why do you lose the third example?
The BD lost and a Neutral won you should win

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Theologian - Neutral Offencive
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The Theologian - Neutral Offensive
Passive: Faithful - Appear BD to invest abillitys. You are occupy immune.

Day ability: Reserve - All day ability’s on your target will fail today(3 uses)

Night ability 1: Preach - Occupy your target and all of his visitors (Unlimited)
Night ability 2: Blessing - Give a player Occupy and Night immunity this night. Does not inform them of this unless they were Occupied or Attacked(2 Uses)

Goal: Ensure the Blue Dragon falls and either you survive or that another Neutral wins.

Ex1: You survive but the other neutrals die with the BD - You win
Ex2: You die but the Scorned executed thier target and the BD fell - You win
Ex3: You die but the Fool is executed with the Unseen - You lose
ect…

Blessing goes before the drunk’s happy hour meaning that he will remove the Immunity’s you add.

Read full topic
